00043 void DateTimeTest::testproperty_Date()
00044 {
00045         DateTime dt;
00046         std::wstring date = L"Jan 15 2005";
00047         dt.Date(date);
00048         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( dt.Date() == date );
00049 }

00051 void DateTimeTest::testproperty_Time()
00052 {
00053         DateTime dt;
00054         std::wstring time = L"12:10Z";
00055         dt.Time(time);
00056         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( dt.Time() == time );
00057 }

00059 void DateTimeTest::testmethod_Clear()
00060 {
00061         DateTime dt;
00062         std::wstring time = L"12:10Z";
00063         dt.Time(time);
00064         std::wstring date = L"Jan 15 2005";
00065         dt.Date(date);
00066         dt.Clear();
00067         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( dt.Time().compare(L"") == 0);
00068         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( dt.Date().compare(L"") == 0);
00069 }
00070 
00071 void DateTimeTest::testmethod_GetCurrentDateTime()
00072 {
00073         DateTime dt = DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime();
00074 
00075         int year=-1;
00076         int month=-1;
00077         int day=-1;
00078         int hour=-2;
00079         int minute=-2;
00080         int second=-2;
00081         int nparsed=0;
00082 
00083         nparsed = swscanf(dt.Date().c_str(), L"%d-%d-%d", &year, &month, &day);
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nparsed == 3);
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( year > 2004 && year < 3000 );
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( month > 0 && month < 13 );
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( day > 0 && day < 32 );
00088 
00089         nparsed = swscanf(dt.Time().c_str(), L"%d:%d:%d", &hour, &minute, &second);
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nparsed == 3);
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( hour > -1 && hour < 25 );
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( minute > -1 && minute < 61 );
00093         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( second > -1 && second < 61 );
00094 }
00095 
00096 void DateTimeTest::testmethod_Parse()
00097 {
00098         DateTime dt1 = DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime();
00099         std::wstring dateString1 = dt1.ToString();
00100         DateTime dt2 = DateTime::Parse(dateString1);
00101         std::wstring dateString2 = dt2.ToString();
00102         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dateString1 == dateString2);
00103         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt2.IsUTC() == true);
00104         std::wstring dateString3(L"2005-12-25T10:13:45");
00105         DateTime dt3 = DateTime::Parse(dateString3);
00106         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt3.Date() == L"2005-12-25");
00107         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt3.Time() == L"10:13:45");
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt3.IsUTC() == false);
00109         std::wstring dateString4(L"2005/12/24T10:13:46Z");
00110         DateTime dt4 = DateTime::Parse(dateString4);
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt4.Date() == L"2005-12-24");
00112         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt4.Time() == L"10:13:46");
00113         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt4.IsUTC() == true);
00114 }
00115 
00116 void DateTimeTest::testmethod_ParseFail()
00117 {
00118         std::wstring dateString(L"This is a bogus time");
00119         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(DateTime::Parse(dateString), affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FormatException);
00120         // slighly less bogus time
00121         dateString = L"Jan 5 2005T10:13:45";
00122         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(DateTime::Parse(dateString), affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FormatException);
00123 }

00125 void DateTimeTest::FormatDateTest()
00126 {
00127         u_int32_t d = 22;
00128         u_int32_t m = 11;
00129         u_int32_t y = 1995;
00130         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(DateTime::FormatDate(y, m, d) == L"1995-11-22");
00131 }

00133 void DateTimeTest::FormatTimeTest()
00134 {
00135         u_int32_t h = 7;
00136         u_int32_t m = 6;
00137         u_int32_t s = 5;
00138         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(DateTime::FormatTime(h, m, s) == L"07:06:05");
00139 
00140 }

00142 void DateTimeTest::FormatDateTimeTest()
00143 {
00144         u_int32_t d = 22;
00145         u_int32_t m = 11;
00146         u_int32_t y = 1995;
00147         u_int32_t h = 7;
00148         u_int32_t min = 6;
00149         u_int32_t s = 5;
00150         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(DateTime::FormatDateTime(y, m, d, h, min, s, false) == L"1995-11-22T07:06:05");
00151 
00152 }
